components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a load balancer and routes incoming traffic to the web application.

components.name: Web App
components.description: The main application hosted on Azure, processing user requests and interacting with the database.

components.name: Azure SQL Database
components.description: Relational database service for storing application data securely.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Protects the web application from common threats and vulnerabilities.

components.name: Application Insights
components.description: Monitors application performance and usage, providing insights for optimization.

data_flows.description: Users access the application via DNS lookup, directing traffic to the Application Gateway.
The Application Gateway routes incoming traffic to the Web App for processing.
The Web App processes data and stores it in the Azure SQL Database.
The Web App sends performance data to Application Insights for monitoring.

trust_boundaries.name: User Access Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between external users and the internal application infrastructure.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary protecting the database from unauthorized access.
